EmailTemplate.name: 2016 HUMS 1239 for Sikorsky S76C+/++.2016 HUMS 1239 for S76C+
EmailTemplate.subject: HUMS 1239 is now available for S-76C+/++ operators
EmailTemplate.textOnly: View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.honeywellaidc.com/pages/SiteLanguages.aspx]]> PROVOCATIVE HEADLINE MEDIUM ARTICLE GOES OVER TWO LINES Sikorsky has authorized Honeywell and our distributors to provide HUMS hardware directly to organizations that operate S-76C++ helicopters. With our HUMS technology onboard, S-76C++ operators have easy access to the information they can use to enhance safety, improve aircraft availability and reduce maintenance costs and maintenance hours. HUMS products collect, process, and interpret data generated by various aircraft systems including rotating and vibrating parts, on the helicopter. FIND OUT MORE <[[#]]> Â© 2016 Honeywell International Inc. <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> This message was sent to {{lead.Email Address:default=edit me}}. If you don't want to receive these emails from Honeywell in the future you can unsubscribe <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Unsubscribelandingpage.html]]> Terms of Use <[[http://www.honeywell.com/terms-conditions]]> | Privacy Policy <[[http://www.honeywell.com/privacy-statement]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]>
